overview:
Scott is a seasoned online media veteran with over 11 years experience building online businesses from start-ups to established brands.

Currently Vice President of business development for Drop.io - a simple, private platform for file sharing and collaboration. Drop.io is a start-up based in Brooklyn, founded by Sam Lessin, and funded by DFJ Gotham and RRE Ventures.

Prior to Drop.io, Scott was Vice President of business development for Fox Interactive Media.

Previous positions include: Lycos.com – Director, Vertical Sales AltaVista.com – Director, Business Development
Excite.com – Director, Channel Sales
